CFS Housekeeping Application (HK) User's Guide

CFS Housekeeping Configuration Parameters

CFS Housekeeping Commands CFS Housekeeping Telemetry CFS Housekeeping Table Definitions

The following are configuration parameters used to configure the CFS Housekeeping Application either for each platform or for a mission as a whole.

Global HK_COPY_TABLE_ENTRIES
Maximum Number of HK Copy Table Entries

Global HK_COPY_TABLE_FILENAME
HK Copy Table Filename

Global HK_COPY_TABLE_NAME
Name of the HK Copy Table

Global HK_DISCARD_INCOMPLETE_COMBO
Discard Incomplete Combo Packets

Global HK_MISSION_REV
Mission specific version number for HK application

Global HK_NUM_BYTES_IN_MEM_POOL
Number of bytes in the HK Memory Pool

Global HK_PIPE_DEPTH
Application Pipe Depth

Global HK_RUNTIME_TABLE_NAME
Name of the HK Run-time Table
